description.message: カメラを使って写真や動画を撮影できます。
description.description: Short description of the Camera App.

errorMsgFileSystemFailed.message: ファイル システム エラー。
errorMsgFileSystemFailed.description: Error message shown when failing to read or write the file system.

errorMsgNoCamera.message:
カメラは現在ご利用いただけません。
正しく接続されているか確認してください。
errorMsgNoCamera.description: Error message shown when it was impossible to connect to the camera due to unavailability.

errorMsgGalleryExportFailed.message: $file$ をエクスポートできません
errorMsgGalleryExportFailed.description: Error message shown when exporting to an external directory failed. Expects a file name to be passed in.

errorMsgSaveFileFailed.message: ファイルを保存できません
errorMsgSaveFileFailed.description: Error message shown when saving/adding a image or video to the file system failed.

errorMsgTakePhotoFailed.message: 写真を撮影できません
errorMsgTakePhotoFailed.description: Error message shown when failing to take photo.

errorMsgRecordStartFailed.message: 録画を開始できません
errorMsgRecordStartFailed.description: Error message shown when failing to start recording video.

errorMsgEmptyRecording.message: 何も記録されていません
errorMsgEmptyRecording.description: Error message shown when no data is recorded for a recording and it won't be added to the gallery.

statusMsgRecordingStopped.description: Status message for spoken feedback when video recording has been stopped.

statusMsgCameraSwitched.description: Status message for spoken feedback when switching over to another camera.

exportButton.message: ディスクにエクスポート

galleryImages.description: Text to speech label for the gallery list.

gridTypeButton.description: Label for the button of grid-type options.

timerDurationButton.description: Label for the button of timer-duration options.

feedbackButton.message: フィードバックを送信

ariaGrid3x3.description: Label for spoken feedback to read out grid-type: 3x3.

ariaGrid4x4.description: Label for spoken feedback to read out grid-type: 4x4.

takePhotoButton.description: Label for the shutter button to take photo.

takePhotoCancelButton.description: Label for the shutter button to cancel countdown timer and stop taking photo.

recordVideoStartButton.description: Label for the shutter button to start recording.

recordVideoStopButton.description: Label for the shutter button to stop recording.

switchCameraButton.message: 次のカメラに切り替える
switchCameraButton.description: Label for the button to switch to next connected camera. Eg. switching from front facing to back facing, or a camera connected via USB. The button is shown only when more than one camera is connected.

switchRecordVideoButton.message: 動画の撮影に切り替える
switchRecordVideoButton.description: Label for the button to switch to record video mode.

switchTakePhotoButton.message: 写真の撮影に切り替える
switchTakePhotoButton.description: Label for the button to switch to take photo mode.

toggleTimerButton.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the countdown timer.

toggleMirrorButton.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the preview mirroring. Eg. if mirroring is toggled on, preview will be flipped horizontally.

toggleGridButton.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the grid shown on preview.

toggleMicButton.description: Label for the checkbox to toggle the microphone for recording video.

dialogOKButton.description: Label for the accepting button in the dialog.

dialogCancelButton.description: Label for the dismissing button in the dialog.

deleteConfirmationMsg.message: $file$ を削除してもよろしいですか？
deleteConfirmationMsg.description: Confirmation message before removing a selected item from the gallery. Expects a file name to be passed in.

deleteMultiConfirmationMsg.message: $count$ 個のアイテムを削除してもよろしいですか？
deleteMultiConfirmationMsg.description: Confirmation message before removing multiple selected items from the gallery. Expects a file count to be passed in.

migratePicturesMsg.message:
カメラで撮影した写真と動画を [ダウンロード] フォルダに移動します。これらの写真や動画には、[ファイル] からアクセスできます。

また、ストレージへのアクセスが許可されているアプリからも、これらの写真や動画にアクセスできます。
migratePicturesMsg.description: Message shown before moving all photos and videos stored in the Camera App to the Downloads folder.
